info.title: Auto-generated OAS of Accountill using OOPS

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: Filter invoices by creator to get the total count

200.description: Total count of invoices retrieved successfully

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the invoice to retrieve

409.description: Error occurred while retrieving the invoice

404.description: No invoice with that id (returned when the provided id is not a valid MongoDB ObjectId)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the invoice to update

404.description: No invoice with that id or Invoice not found

200.description: Successful response with clients data and pagination info

404.description: Error response when clients cannot be retrieved

200.description: Successful signin - returns the authenticated user, their profile (if any), and an auth token.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: User ID to search profiles by

404.description: Profile not found or error occurred

requestBody.description: Profile data to create a new profile

404.description: Profile already exists or other error

200.description: Successful signup. Returns created user (result), an associated userProfile (if any), and an authentication token.

400.description: Bad Request — either the user already exists or the provided passwords do not match.

500.description: Internal Server Error — an unexpected error occurred while processing the request.

422.description: User does not exist in database

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: Filter invoices by creator. Provide the creator identifier (e.g. user id or username) as a query string value.

200.description: Successful response returning an array of invoice documents in the 'data' property.

404.description: Invoices not found or an error occurred while fetching invoices.

requestBody.description: Invoice object that needs to be added

error.example: User does not exist in our database

token.description: JWT token issued for the newly created user

businessName.description: Business name associated with the profile

logo.description: Logo URL or path for the profile

Array of user id strings as stored in the profile

inline_response_200_6_userProfile.description: Profile document associated with the user, if any. May be absent/null in some cases.
